author: Source: South Wales Guardian
title: Injuries no excuse for Kevin De Bruyne as Manchester City try to stay ... - South Wales Guardian
text:
Kevin de Bruyne accepts there can be no excuses if Manchester City slip up in the absences of Sergio Aguero and David Silva. City's most established attacking duo were both injured in the recent international break with star striker Aguero set to be out for at least a month and playmaker Silva a fortnight.
 South Wales Guardian.
